DOC.brief_summary: Determine the plasma concentration profile after single and multiple dosing of Sufentanil NanoTabs
DOC.brief_title: Single and Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetics of Sufentanil NanoTab
DOC.criteria: Non smoking Ages 18 to 45 year, inclusive BMI between 18 and 30 Subjects taking any prescription or OTC medications or vitamins or supplements Pregnant females Subjects with pulmonary disease or sleep apnea
